basics.name: Alan Maciel
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary:
I'm a Software Engineer based in Mexico.
My practice primarily focuses on code, create and maintain scalable software products and apply generative processes using AI.

references.name: David Bennett - Director of Application Engineering at Dealerware
references.reference: Beyond his technical skills, Alan is a natural leader. He has the rare ability to both inspire and challenge his team, fostering an environment of continuous learning and improvement. His leadership was instrumental in building a cohesive team that consistently exceeded our expectations. Alan's ability to mentor junior engineers and his willingness to share his knowledge have greatly contributed to the overall skill enhancement of our team.

references.name: Hugo Hernandez - Senior Tech Recruiter at Don Chambitas
references.reference: Everytime that the guys I sent to Alan to work for him tell me he is such a great leader, makes me think of the great person I've been creating relations with. Alan has just that friendly way to ask you for things to get done. I haven't worked in the same office with him but could say he is a professional.

references.name: Ana Carolina Blanco - VP Data Officer at Banbajio
references.reference: I've worked directly with Alan for serveral time, and I can tell for sure that he's very good on what he does, always reading and searching for more, with an excelente actitude, even in proyects with high stress.

references.name: Bruno Unna - Chief Architect at Getvisibility
references.reference:
A very appreciated element in his environment, both in a personal and a professional perspectives, and with good reasons. An example: when everyone else at the time and moment (including myself) were working with static languages, Alan had the vision and courage to pursue development endeavors using dynamic ones.
That, for sure, speaks of Alan's energetic and well-founded capacity to trace a long term route, and to follow it.

references.name: Pedro Verdin - SysAdmin at Grupo Flexi
references.reference: During the time at University in which I had the opportunity to deal with Alan Maciel, I was able to perceive his insight and ability to detect essential aspects in the functioning of technology, in addition to being a dedicated and responsible person in his areas of interest.
